#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define set(p) memset(p,-1,sizeof(p))
#define clr(p) memset(p,0,sizeof(p))
#define ll long long int
#define llu unsigned long long int
#define si(n)					scanf("%d",&n)
#define sf(n) 					scanf("%lf",&n)
#define ss(n)                                   scanf("%s",n)
#define rep(i,a,n) for(i=(a);i<(n);i++)
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define v(x) vector<x>
using namespace std;

int gcd(int a,int b)
{
 int r, i;
  while(b!=0){
    r = a % b;
    a = b;
    b = r;
  }
  return a;
}


long long int power(long long int x,long long int y)
{
    long long int temp,ty,my;
    long long int mod;
    mod=1000000007;
    if( y == 0)
        return 1;
    temp = power(x, y/2);
    ty=(temp%mod)*(temp%mod);
    if (y%2 == 0)
        {

                return ty%mod;
        }
    else
        {
                my=(x%mod)*(ty%mod);
                return my%mod;
        }
}



long long int mini(long long int a,long long int b)
{
        return a<b?a:b;
}



struct stud
{
       ll a;
       ll b;
};

struct stud brr[100010];
struct stud yoyo[100010];

bool cmp(struct stud x,struct stud y)
{
    //if(x.b!=y.b)
        return x.b<y.b;
    //else
        //return x.a<y.a;
}

char ss[100010];
ll a[100100];
ll b[100100];
//int b[100000];
vector< pair<int,int> > abhi;

ll dp[200][3000];


ll solve(ll current,ll time,ll n)
{
    if(current==n)
        return 0;
    if(dp[current][time]!=-1)
        return dp[current][time];
    else
    {
        ll ans=100000;
        if((time+yoyo[current].a)<=yoyo[current].b)
        ans=mini(ans,solve(current+1,time+yoyo[current].a,n));

        ans=mini(ans,1+solve(current+1,time,n));

        dp[current][time]=ans;
        return ans;
    }

}

int main()
{
        ll t,m,i,n,r,j,k=0,p,kk=0;
        cin>>t;
        while(t--)
        {
            kk++;
            cin>>n;
            rep(i,0,n)
            {
                cin>>brr[i].a;
            }
            ll maxt=0;
            ll j=0;
            rep(i,0,n)
            {
                cin>>brr[i].b;
                brr[i].b=brr[i].b-30;
                if((brr[i].b)>0)
                {
                    yoyo[j].a=brr[i].a;
                    yoyo[j].b=brr[i].b;
                    j++;
                    maxt+=brr[i].a;
                }
            }
            ll new_n=j;
            sort(yoyo,yoyo+j,cmp);
            memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));

            ll ans=solve(0,0,new_n);

            cout<<"Case "<<kk<<": "<<ans<<"\n";
        }

        return 0;
}
